title: NATIONAL CONSENSUS SURVEYS
instructions: Please take a few minutes to go through the advertisements in the book. Please take as much time with each ad as you desire. If you ordinarily wear reading glasses, you'll need them.
portfolio: HAND RESPONDENT PORTFOLIO AND TAKE IT BACK BEFORE CONTINUING

questions.question: Now I'd like to ask you a few questions about the ads in the book. What brand or products do you remember seeing ads for in the book?
Do you remember any ads for cigarettes?
Do you remember any ads for any other brands of cigarettes?

skipInstructions: IF NO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ABOVE ASK Q.3.
IF ONLY ONE OR TWO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED SKIP TO Q.3b.
IF ALL THREE CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED SKIP TO Q.4.
IF TRUE MENTIONED IN Q.23 OR 3b CONTINUE.
IF TRUE NOT MENTIONED IN Q.23 OR 3b SKIP TO Q.10.
